column4: hi, i have Ubuntu 10.04 , and i want to update KDE 4.4.2 to KDE 4.5.1 , how?
if you are not using Kubuntu but you have KDE packages on Ubuntu that you want to upgrade, maybe you can do it using the synaptic package manager?
synaptic package manager does not show me the newer version :|
then you might need to get it yourself from the source, you know that the version exists, so you should be able to find out where to download it
